name: Raider rumours 1
text: There have been rumours of a highly organized raider group wreaking havoc in the wastes using old world war tactics.

name: Raider rumours 2
text: Foreign merchants came to town with stories of a highly capable raider group whose numbers are counted in the thousands. Our people are unnerved.
